overview.base:
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like Opportunity Attack.
Note: This ability can trigger in the middle of moving. You could approach an enemy, trigger this ability, take an Opportunity Attack against them, keep moving towards them, and trigger this ability again.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.

overview.base: You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
Note: A target moving due to Knockback can still provoke reactions like Opportunity Attack.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You cannot use items in your hands.
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like Opportunity Attack.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.
